tips.tip: Use unique passwords for each payment app and enable 2FA
Link payment apps to the provided phone number, not personal numbers
Complete first transaction within 24 hours to establish account
Verify email and phone on all platforms immediately
Regularly rotate API keys and access tokens
Maintain consistent transaction patterns - avoid sudden large transfers
Keep Venmo/CashApp balances under $1000 to avoid scrutiny
Use multiple small transactions instead of one large one
Add profile picture to all social/payment accounts
Make initial small transactions between team accounts
Post occasional updates on social media to maintain account authenticity
Regularly send/receive SMS to maintain phone number activity

recommendations: Gradually build account history over 30 days

setup.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Phone Provisioning Script for ag003526@payment-ops.duoplus.android
# Generated: 2026-01-14T07:43:06.631Z

echo "üì± Setting up iPhone 14 for agent..."

# Install required apps
echo "Installing messaging apps..."
adb install messaging_apps.apk

# Configure phone settings
echo "Configuring phone settings..."
adb shell settings put global airplane_mode_on 0
adb shell settings put global mobile_data 1
adb shell settings put global wifi_on 1

# Setup SMS forwarding (if virtual)
if [ -n "https://webhook.duoplus.android/agent/AG003526/sms" ]; then
  echo "Configuring SMS forwarding to https://webhook.duoplus.android/agent/AG003526/sms"
  adb push sms_forwarding.config /data/local/tmp/
fi

# Setup voicemail
echo "Setting up voicemail..."
adb shell am start -a android.intent.action.CALL -d tel:14647675677

# Install payment apps
echo "Installing payment apps..."
for app in venmo cashapp paypal; do
  adb install ${app}.apk
done

# Configure payment apps with agent credentials
echo "Configuring Venmo..."
adb shell input text "+1 (464) 767-5677"
adb shell input keyevent KEYCODE_ENTER

echo "‚úÖ Phone setup complete for +1 (464) 767-5677"
echo "üìû Test by calling: +1 (464) 767-5677"
setup.checklist:
# Agent Setup Checklist: AG003526
## Phase 1: Immediate (Day 1)
- [ ] Verify email address on all platforms
- [ ] Verify phone number for SMS/2FA
- [ ] Set up unique passwords + 2FA
- [ ] Complete first small transaction ($5-20)
- [ ] Add profile picture

## Phase 2: First Week
- [ ] Make 3-5 transactions across different platforms
- [ ] Send 10+ SMS messages
- [ ] Make 2-3 social media posts
- [ ] Connect with 5+ colleagues on LinkedIn

## Phase 3: Ongoing (Monthly)
- [ ] Rotate passwords
- [ ] Review transaction patterns
- [ ] Update social profiles
- [ ] Backup account credentials

## Red Flags to Avoid
‚ùå Don't make transactions over $500 in first month
‚ùå Don't link personal bank accounts
‚ùå Don't use same device for multiple agents
‚ùå Don't post location or sensitive info

## Success Metrics
‚úÖ Daily SMS activity
‚úÖ Weekly transactions
‚úÖ Monthly social engagement
‚úÖ Quarterly security review
setup.emailConfig:
# Postfix Configuration for duoplus.android
myhostname = mail.duoplus.android
mydomain = duoplus.android
myorigin = $mydomain
inet_interfaces = all
mydestination = $myhostname, localhost.$mydomain, localhost, $mydomain
mynetworks = 127.0.0.0/8 [::ffff:127.0.0.0]/104 [::1]/128
home_mailbox = Maildir/
smtpd_tls_cert_file = /etc/ssl/certs/ssl-cert-snakeoil.pem
smtpd_tls_key_file = /etc/ssl/private/ssl-cert-snakeoil.key
smtpd_use_tls = yes
smtpd_tls_session_cache_database = btree:${data_directory}/smtpd_scache
smtp_tls_session_cache_database = btree:${data_directory}/smtp_scache

# Agent mailboxes (auto-created)
virtual_alias_maps = hash:/etc/postfix/virtual

# DKIM Signing
smtpd_milters = inet:localhost:8891
non_smtpd_milters = $smtpd_milters
milter_default_action = accept
